name: Red and Green Christmas Jalapeno Jelly
author: MARBALET
summary: This is a beautiful jelly of red bell peppers and green jalapenos.  It's a perfect relish to many holiday favorites, or serve it with cream cheese on a cracker.
directions: Remove stems, veins and most of the seeds of the bell and jalapeno peppers
Mince peppers in a food processor
In a 5-quart pot over high heat, combine bell peppers, jalapenos, sugar and vinegar
Bring to a rolling boil; boil for 3 minutes
Remove from heat and cool for 5 minutes
Stirring constantly, add the pectin and let mixture continue to cool for 2 minutes more
Pour into hot, sterilized jars and top with sterilized lids
Secure lids with bands and allow jars to cool slowly, creating a vacuum seal
